video.title: STUDY FINDS HIGH-DOSE INTAKE OF THREE B VITAMINS DOES NOT REDUCE WOMEN’S RISK OF DEVELOPING CANCER
video.description: Approximately one-third of U.S. adults take multivitamin supplements containing three B vitamins – B6, B12, and Folic Acid – as part of a balanced diet.  But do large, daily doses of those vitamins, in supplements, help reduce cancer risk in women?  We now have results of a study which explored that very question.
